file_insights.changes: Updated workflow.compile() method call to explicitly pass None as checkpointer

patterns_discovered: Explicit checkpointer configuration in LangGraph workflow
gotchas_discovered: New checkpoint system requires explicit checkpointer parameter
Workflows may need different checkpoint strategies based on statefulness
recommendations: Consider adding type hints for checkpointer parameter

Create a helper method to determine appropriate checkpointer based on workflow characteristics
